embed.title: Power Rating
embed.description:
• Each troops and hero has a power rating which depends on the unit’s rarity and level. The sum of power ratings of all units used is the power rating of an army.
• You can a player’s current attack power (<:atkpower:849194035733069828>) and defense power (<:defpower:968339445512306748>) in the player’s profile page.
• The power rating doesn’t necessarily correlate to the strength of an army. In general, two armies with less than 300k power rating difference are considered even.
